docs.lead_paragraph: Serge Ibaka, whose defense and steady scoring helped Oklahoma City reach the Western Conference finals, is expected to miss the rest of the playoffs after injuring his left calf Thursday.
docs.abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder forward Serge Ibaka is expected to miss the rest of the NBA playoffs due to an injury in his left calf; Ibaka's defense and steady scoring have been an important part of team's success.

headline.main: Thunder’s Ibaka Is Probably Finished for Season With Calf Injury

docs.lead_paragraph: The narrative the Clippers were clinging to, that they were the team of destiny after so much turmoil, was shattered by the Thunder, who advanced to the Western Conference finals.
docs.abstract: Los Angeles Clippers begin reckoning with their season-ending loss to Oklahoma City Thunder; team, reeling from turmoil surrounding owner Donald Sterling, had hoped to redeem themselves with a championship victory.

headline.main: Clippers Can’t Believe Their Surreal Season Has Ended
